abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32845033, pmid32811804, pmid32841386, pmid32402910, pmid32844730, pmid32844739, pmid32831045, pmid32860768, pmid32787979, pmid32750010, pmid32845742, pmid32835425
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.09.01
